tiles.displayName: Log Errors Type and Component Correlation
Siebel Exception Codes and Components Correlation

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput:
card=<field:Affected Business Flows>
card=<field:Unique Sensors Triggered>
card=<field:Total Sensor Triggers>
tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'Siebel Sensor*' | link 'Log Source' | rename Count as 'Number of triggers' | stats latest(sensor) as Sensor | lookup table = Siebel_CRM_Sensors select 'Business impact' as Description, 'Business flow', 'Solution / Troubleshooting Note' as N1 using Sensor = 'Sensor Name' | eval 'Oracle KB Link' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/DocumentDisplay?id=' || N1, 'Support Article') | eval 'File SR' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/SrCreate', SR) | highlightgroups color = #FF5733 [ * | where 'Issue Severity' = '2' ] as 'High Priority' | eventstats sum('Number of triggers') as 'Total Sensor Triggers', distinctcount('Business flow') as 'Affected Business Flows', distinctcount('Log Source') as 'Unique Sensors Triggered'
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | search 'Exception Code' not like 'sbl-bpr%' and 'Exception Code' != null | stats count as 'Exception Codes' by 'Exception Code'

savedSearches.displayName: Log Errors Type and Component Correlation
savedSearches.description: Log Errors Type and Component Correlation

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' and Subtype not in (genericlog) | link 'Log Source', Component, Type | stats unique(Subtype) as Subtype | classify topcount = 300 correlate = -*, Subtype 'Start Time', Type, Count, 'Group Duration', Component as 'Component Vs Type'
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | stats count by Type
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' and 'Problem Priority' != null | cluster
'Entity Type' in ('Siebel Gateway Server', 'Siebel Server', 'Siebel Component') and 'Exception Code' != null | stats count as logrecords by 'Exception Code' | sort -logrecords

savedSearches.displayName: Siebel Exception Codes and Components Correlation
savedSearches.description: Siebel Exception Codes and Components Correlation

uiConfig.queryString: 'Entity Type' in ('Siebel Gateway Server', 'Siebel Server', 'Siebel Component') and 'Exception Code' != null | eval 'Search MOS' = url('oracle-mosc', '' || 'Exception Code') | eval Help = url('oracle-tech', '' || 'Exception Code') | link cluster(), 'Exception Code', Component | stats unique('Search MOS') as 'MOSC Search', unique(Help) as 'Oracle Tech Forums', unique(Component) as Component | eval 'Query MOS' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/main/kmservlet?operation=search&sources=ALLSOURCES&term=' || 'Exception Code', 'Exception Code') | highlightgroups priority = high [ * | where 'Potential Issue' = '1' ] | sort -Count | rename Count as Records | classify topcount = 300 correlate = -*, 'Exception Code' 'Start Time', Component, Records as 'Error Type Correlation'
'Exception Code' != null | stats count as ct by 'Exception Code' | sort -ct

'Entity Type' in ('Siebel Gateway Server', 'Siebel Server', 'Siebel Component') and 'Exception Code' != null | eval 'Search MOS' = url('oracle-mosc', '' || 'Exception Code') | eval Help = url('oracle-tech', '' || 'Exception Code') | link cluster(), 'Exception Code' | stats unique('Search MOS') as 'MOSC Search', unique(Help) as 'Oracle Tech Forums', unique(Component) as Component | eval 'Query MOS' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/main/kmservlet?operation=search&sources=ALLSOURCES&term=' || 'Exception Code', 'Exception Code') | highlightgroups priority = high [ * | where 'Potential Issue' = '1' ] | sort -Count | rename Count as Records | classify topcount = 300 'Start Time', Component, Records, 'Exception Code' as 'Error Type Correlation'
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | stats distinctcount(Component) as Components
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | timestats count by 'Log Source'
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | timestats count as Activity by 'Security Category'

'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' and 'Entity Type' in ('Oracle Database Instance', 'Automatic Storage Management', 'Oracle Database Listener', 'Oracle Clusterware') and 'Message Group' in (ORA, NZE, EXP, IMP, 'SQL*Loader', KUP, UDE, UDI, DBV, NID, DGM, DIA, LCD, OCI, QSM, RMAN, LRM, LFI, PLS, PLW, AMD, CLSR, CLSS, CRS, EVM, CLST, CLSD, PROC, PROT, TNS, NNC, NNO, NPL, NNF, NMP, NCR, O2F, O2I, O2U, PCB, PCC, SQL, AUD, IMG, VID, DRG, LPX, LSX, PGA, PGU) or 'Message Group' like '%NNL' | stats count as 'Error Count' by Entity | top limit = 10 'Error Count'
'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' | stats count by Label

'Log Origin' like '%/mnt/docker%' and 'Entity Type' in ('Oracle Database Instance', 'Automatic Storage Management', 'Oracle Database Listener', 'Oracle Clusterware') | timestats count as logrecords by 'Log Source'
